name: Afghanistan
description:
This is Afghanistan Flag #30 out of 228 NFTs (Countries + Our Logo) on the moon, They are pixel squares that emit moonlight. Created by Global Moon Club ( MoonElite.com ) NFTs on the Polygon Blockchain for the people who proud and love of their country and enjoy traveling to other countries.
\Get 1 or 2 countries NFTs you like To Take the Following Features :
\1- Add Beauty and Patriotism to your Collection Wallet, by Get NFT of your Country's Flag on the Moon.
\2- Build Together the Largest Community in the world.
\3- Participate in Saving People's Lives with Donations that will be in the Phase 4 Mentioned in our ROADMAP. (Life Saving Will Open the Doors of Success for You in your Life).
\4- If you are Lucky, you will Win one of our Valuable Gifts Mentioned in our ROADMAP.
\5- Authorization to enter our Future WEB 3 (Metaverse, etc.) Game (Play & Earn).
